metas.product_tagline: Secure, Versatile, and Connected Access for Modern Properties

image_gallery.image_caption: A sleek IntelliReader installed on a contemporary door, a hand shown interacting with its responsive tempered glass interface.
A detailed close-up of the IntelliReader, highlighting its durable aluminum alloy body and the clear digital keypad on the tempered glass surface.
The IntelliReader showcased alongside other 33 Lock products like the IntelliMortise and IntelliLever, demonstrating a cohesive and stylish product family.

metas.product_overview: The 33 Lock IntelliReader is a sophisticated access control unit designed to operate any 12V electric lock, offering a robust and flexible solution for hotels, multifamily properties, and commercial buildings. Engineered for both online and offline operation, the IntelliReader ensures seamless access and enhanced security, integrating effortlessly into your existing infrastructure and the wider 33 Lock ecosystem.

key_features.feature_description: Empower users with multiple ways to enter, including PIN code, RFID card, digital key (via app), WiFi open, and even fingerprint access. A mechanical key option provides reliable backup.
Operates effectively in both online and offline modes, ensuring continuous access regardless of network status.
key_features.feature_icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" class="w-6 h-6"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M3 16.5v2.25A2.25 2.25 0 005.25 21h13.5A2.25 2.25 0 0021 18.75V16.5m-13.5-9L12 3m0 0l4.5 4.5M12 3v13.5" /></svg>

key_features.feature_description: Set 4-9 digit PIN codes tailored to your security needs.
key_features.feature_icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" class="w-6 h-6"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M16.5 10.5V6.75a4.5 4.5 0 10-9 0v3.75m-.75 11.25h10.5a2.25 2.25 0 002.25-2.25v-6.75a2.25 2.25 0 00-2.25-2.25H6.75a2.25 2.25 0 00-2.25 2.25v6.75a2.25 2.25 0 002.25 2.25z" /></svg>

key_features.feature_description: Implement door schedules, passage mode for high traffic, and auto re-lock features for enhanced security and convenience.
Keep track of access with detailed logs and receive tamper alerts for unauthorized attempts.
Designed to operate any standard 12V electric lock, offering broad compatibility.
Controls each door independently for precise access management.
key_features.feature_icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" class="w-6 h-6"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M15.75 9V5.25A2.25 2.25 0 0013.5 3h-6a2.25 2.25 0 00-2.25 2.25v13.5A2.25 2.25 0 007.5 21h6a2.25 2.25 0 002.25-2.25V15M12 9l-3 3m0 0l3 3m-3-3h12.75" /></svg>

key_features.feature_description: Constructed from high-quality aluminum alloy and tempered glass, with an IP66 waterproof rating, making it suitable for various environments.
key_features.feature_icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" class="w-6 h-6"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M3.75 13.5l10.5-11.25L12 10.5h8.25L9.75 21.75 12 13.5H3.75z" /></svg>

key_features.feature_description: Works harmoniously with other 33 Lock smart lock products and the TTLock app for a unified access control experience.

transform_points.transform_point: Uncompromised Security: Robust materials and multiple access credentials protect your property.
Streamlined Operations: Simplify access for guests, residents, and staff, reducing the need for physical key management.
Enhanced User Experience: Offer a modern, keyless experience that users appreciate.
Flexible & Scalable: Adaptable to various door types and property sizes, from single doors to large complexes.

specifications.spec_value: PIN, RFID, Digital Key, WiFi, Fingerprint, Metal Key
Details not specified in available information
Details not specified in available information

metas.design_description: The IntelliReader combines elegant design with rugged construction. Its tempered glass interface is both stylish and resilient, while the aluminum alloy body ensures longevity, even in demanding conditions.

integration_points.integration_description: Manage and monitor your IntelliReader units through the industry-leading TTLock application.
integration_points.integration_icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" class="w-8 h-8"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M10.5 1.5H8.25A2.25 2.25 0 006 3.75v16.5a2.25 2.25 0 002.25 2.25h7.5A2.25 2.25 0 0018 20.25V3.75a2.25 2.25 0 00-2.25-2.25H13.5m-3 0V3h3V1.5m-3 0h3m-3 18.75h3" /></svg>

integration_points.integration_description: Designed to work flawlessly with IntelliMortise, IntelliLever, and IntelliBolt for a comprehensive security solution.
Leverage 33 Lock's API capabilities for custom integrations and advanced automation (based on general 33 Lock offerings).
integration_points.integration_icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" class="w-8 h-8"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M17.25 6.75L22.5 12l-5.25 5.25m-10.5 0L1.5 12l5.25-5.25m7.5-3l-4.5 16.5" /></svg>

applications.application_description: Streamline guest check-in/out, manage staff access to secure areas, and monitor entry points in real-time.
Simplify resident access, manage visitor entry, facilitate secure property viewings, and control access to common areas like gyms and parking garages.
Secure main entrances, individual offices, server rooms, and other sensitive areas with flexible access credentials.
applications.application_icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" class="w-8 h-8"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M3.75 21h16.5M4.5 3h15M5.25 3v18m13.5-18v18M9 6.75h1.5m-1.5 3h1.5m-1.5 3h1.5m3-6H15m-1.5 3H15m-1.5 3H15M9 21v-3.375c0-.621.504-1.125 1.125-1.125h3.75c.621 0 1.125.504 1.125 1.125V21" /></svg>

included_items.item_name: Quick Start & Installation Guide (Note: Requires a 12V DC power supply, typically sourced separately based on installation needs.)

testimonials.testimonial_quote: The IntelliReader has been a game-changer for our boutique hotel. Guests love the seamless access, and our staff finds it incredibly easy to manage.
We installed IntelliReaders across our new apartment complex. The security, combined with the modern aesthetic, is exactly what we were looking for.

metas.cta_heading: Ready to Modernize Your Access Control?
metas.cta_subheading: Take the next step towards a more secure, efficient, and user-friendly property.

related_products.product_description: Our flagship smart mortise lock for ultimate security and style.
Smart lever lock solutions for easy retrofitting and diverse applications.
Robust smart deadbolts for enhanced door security.
